description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(185).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,136,0,0,0,0,1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,1,2,3,5,133,138,271,409,680]; [n le 10 select I[n] else 136*Self(n-5)+Self(n-10): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 16 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
